about_the_game:
The Wolf's Fury soundtrack features all the music composed exclusively for the game. The soundtrack of the game was composed by Romain Favre, the main composer of the acclaimed Vairon's Wrath soundtrack. Enjoy !

Wolf's Fury OST By Romain Favre.




The OST contains all the game tracks.

-----------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Complete Track listing (Warning can contain spoil) :

Wolf's Fury title screen

Wolf's Fury intro theme

Wolf's Fury The nice spooky forest

Wolf's Fury Scandalious Generals

Wolf's Fury Victory theme

Wolf's Fury Waves of the night

Wolf's Fury Stinking sewers

Wolf's Fury Song of the beach

Wolf's Fury Cave of the shadows

Wolf's Fury The jungle rythm

Wolf's Fury Fire dance

Wolger versus Scandalious

Wolf's Fury epilogue

Wolf's Fury Weird meeting

Wolf's Fury end credits

Wolf's Fury Game Over

Wolf's Fury The nice spooky forest , Wolf's Fury Waves of the night and Wolf's Fury Cave of the shadows are also available in FLAC !
detailed_description:
The Wolf's Fury soundtrack features all the music composed exclusively for the game. The soundtrack of the game was composed by Romain Favre, the main composer of the acclaimed Vairon's Wrath soundtrack. Enjoy !

The OST contains all the game tracks.

name: Wolf's Fury Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • Storage: 205 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card or integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Nvidia Geforce graphic card or dedicated ATI graphic card
  • Storage: 205 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card or integrated sound card

supported_languages:
English*, French*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
